info.institution: Data Engineering Lab (DeLab)  Department of Informatics  Aristotle University of Thessaloniki
info.summary:
Apostolos Papadopoulos works as a Assistant Professor in Data Engineering Lab (DeLab)  Department of Informatics  Aristotle University of Thessaloniki, and his\her h-index is 27, g-index is 51. His\Her interests are :
 Data Mining; Spatial Database; Data Stream; Similarity Search; Nearest Neighbor;
